title: File a Windshield Repair Claim
description: A customer has a small chip in their windshield and wants to file a claim under their comprehensive coverage.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and verify they have comprehensive coverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer has the necessary coverage for glass repair.

tasks.description: Explain that windshield repair is often covered with no deductible.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs the customer there will likely be no out-of-pocket cost.

tasks.description: Connect the customer with a network glass repair shop to schedule the service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules an appointment for the customer with a local approved vendor.
